column2: Public hearing to add your building to FAH district
column10: New construction and major improvement is public hearing
column12: Dimensions are for C/R 1 and 2, C/R 3 (district @ intersection of W Jamaica and Stratton Arlington) has different dimensions: min lot size is 1 acre, frontage is 100, and setbacks from property line is 25 ft (from cetner road is still 50)
column14: setback is from property line, 175 ft min from center line of road/right of way
column16: Density max of 5 units/acre, Only in RES or C/R districts, must follow rules on page 51 of bylaws pdf
